posts.message: السلام عليكم ايه احسن سيرفير ممكن ادفع سنوي و ارفع عليه عدد لا نهائي من دومين ؟ شكرا

We are teaming up

We are creating an App to help the refugees starting their new lives in germany. This app wil be helping over 800,000 refugees all over germany.

It is a very simple app to connect the people who need help "Refugees" with the people who are willing to help "Volunteers"

We collected the requirement from both sides refugees and volunteers and created an abstract layout for the app

Now we need to create a demo app for the purpose of fund raising and after achieving our target we will continue with the development.

We are a team of three engineers and looking for other two enthusiastic volunteers s who can share with us  the same mission to ease the refugees lives and belive that,  technology is one of the best means to reach such a goal.
 
We need two active team players: 

1- An innovative Android developer
2- A creative Graphic designer (adobe and flash) 

I hope you guys can help and may god help us to help those who in need for our help.

Thanks!
Dahy

posts.message: Hi all, this probably is a noob question as I have absolutely no experience in front end work. I'm using 2 libraries in a website, both have a CSS class with the same name which causes a conflict. Is there a way to resolve this conflict other than renaming the class?

Full Stack Overflow developers work almost entirely by copying and pasting code from Stack Overflow instead of understanding what they are doing. Instead of researching a topic, they go there first to ask a question hoping people will just give them the result.

Using something that works immediately, even if you don’t know how it does it, feels better than encountering the frustration of not being able to fix something.

Posting the “one true solution” and winning a thread on Stack Overflow feels great – even if we have no plan whatsoever to come back to it later if it turns out not to be such a good idea any longer as the environment changed.

So what? Why is it a problem if people are faster and more effective in releasing products?

even stack overflow nooooooooooooooo ,the essay aim's to decrease feast  happiness ,just joking ....
posts.caption: sitepoint.com
posts.description: Microsoft's Christian Heilmann explains the disadvantages of being a "Full Stack Overflow" developer
